description: After a picnic-perfect salad recipe? Ready in 15 minutes, this apple and fennel salad is drizzled with buttermilk dressing and topped with maple pecans.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Summer,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Quick & easy lunch,Apr 2021
name: Pickled Apple & Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Kanzi apples, quartered, cored, thinly sliced
1 fennel bulb, trimmed, thinly sliced including stalks, fronds reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Place pecans in a small frying pan over low heat and toast, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until golden. Add 1 tbs maple syrup and swirl to coat. Transfer to a baking paper-lined tray and allow to cool.
Meanwhile, combine remaining maple syrup, vinegar and 1/2 cup water in a medium bowl. Add apple and turn to coat. Set aside.
Place mayonnaise, buttermilk and 1 tbs pickling liquid in a jug. Season and stir to combine.
Place rocket, fennel and drained apple in a large bowl. Serve drizzled with mayonnaise mixture and topped with pecans and reserved fronds.
